file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 23-51-04-04 - COCKPIT LOUDSPEAKER - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL COCKPIT LOUDSPEAKER - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the cockpit loudspeakers. B. There are two cockpit loudspeakers installed on the aircraft. They are installed on the cockpit ceiling, on the 225ALC (pilot) and 226ARC (copilot) panels. The removal/installation procedures of this section are the same for them. C. The cockpit loudspeaker permits audio to come to the cockpit crew. D. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 23-51-04-000-801-A COCKPIT LOUDSPEAKER - REMOVAL COCKPIT LOUDSPEAKER - INSTALLA- ALL 23-51-04-400-801-A TION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 23-51-04 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 23-51-04-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. COCKPIT LOUDSPEAKER - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to remove the cockpit loudspeaker. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-03/100 - COMPONENT LOCATION C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 225 225ALC Cockpit ceiling - LH side 226 226ARC Cockpit ceiling - RH side D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task In the cockpit, LH and RH sides I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open the circuit breakers below and attach a DO-NOT- CLOSE tag to them: • INTPH 1 (Location Tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 1/COMM/INTPH 1). • INTPH 2 (Location Tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 2/COMM/INTPH 2). (2) Remove ceiling lining panels 225ALC or 226ARC (as applicable), from the cockpit ceiling ( AMM MPP 06-41-03/100). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 23-51-04 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Remove the four screws (3) and washers (2) that attach the loudspeaker (4) to the loudspeaker support (5). (2) Disconnect the electrical connector (1). (3) Remove the loudspeaker (4). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 23-51-04 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Cockpit Loudspeaker - Removal/Installation Figure 401 A A 5. LOUDSPEAKER SUPPORT 4. LOUDSPEAKER 1. ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR (2) 2. WASHER (4) 3. SCREW (4) CEILING LINING PANEL (REF.) DET. A 145AMM230201.MCE A EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 23-51-04 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 23-51-04-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. COCKPIT LOUDSPEAKER - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to install the cockpit loudspeaker. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-03/100 - COMPONENT LOCATION AUDIO SYSTEM EMERGENCY MODE - OPERATION- AMM TASK 23-51-00-700-801-A/500 AL CHECK C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 225 225ALC Cockpit ceiling - LH side 226 226ARC Cockpit ceiling - RH side D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task In the cockpit, LH and RH sides I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Connect the electrical connector (1) to the loudspeaker (4). (2) Put the loudspeaker (4) in position. (3) Install the washers (2) and screws (3) to attach the loudspeaker (4) to the support (5). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 23-51-04 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install ceiling lining panels 225ALC or 226ARC (as applicable) to the cockpit ceiling ( AMM MPP 06-41-03/100). (2) On the circuit breaker panel, close the circuit breakers below and remove the DO- NOT-CLOSE tag from them: • INTPH 1 (Location Tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 1/COMM/INTPH 1). • INTPH 2 (Location Tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 2/COMM/INTPH 2). (3) Do the Audio System Operational Test ( AMM TASK 23-51-00-700-801-A/500). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 23-51-04 Page 6 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
